result.execSummary:
The defendant Richard L Ramirez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Total costs and fines to be payed in 60 days.  $150 bail/bond on deposit applied to costs leaving an outstanding balance of $293.  Failure to pay will result in one day jail for each $25 owed for contempt of court.

Court orders absolute sobriety.  No possession/consumption of any intoxicants.
Defendant to participate in drug and/or alcohol counseling and treatment deemed appropriate by DOC and to pay all costs of treatment
Defendant to have No Violent Contact with victim in case.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Richard L Ramirez in court with attorney Kristina M Cervera Garcia.  Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel submits plea questionnaire and waiver.  Court examines the defendant as to the waiver.  Defendant enters a guilty plea.  Court accepts the plea, finding it to be free and voluntary.  Court finds the defendant guilty as to his plea and renders judgment.
Deferred prosecution agreement hearing on June 8, 2016 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Richard L Ramirez in court with attorney Kristina M Cervera Garcia.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Request adjournment pending arrangements for counseling.  Deferred prosecution agreement hearing scheduled for June 8, 2016 at 01:15 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 14, 2016 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Richard L Ramirez in court with attorney Kristina M Cervera Garcia.  Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Counsel requesting a plea date. Defendant needs to complete some requirements of the pretrial offer.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for April 14, 2016 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Richard L Ramirez in court with attorney Kristina M Cervera Garcia.  Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Counsel waives reading and enters not guilty plea. Pretrial at convenience of parties.  Further proceedings scheduled for March 9, 2016 at 01:15 pm.

Defendant Richard L Ramirez in court.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court advises of penalties.  Defendant contacted public defender but has not received a call back.  Plea hearing scheduled for February 3, 2016 at 10:00 am.
w/conditions: Absolute sobriety; No violent contact with M.R.

Defendant Richard L Ramirez in court.  Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court advises defendant of penalties. Court waives reading and finds probable cause. Defendant requests adjournment to contact public defenders office.  Further proceedings scheduled for December 21, 2015 at 08:15 am.
